title: Understanding Explicit Bias
text: Explicit bias refers to the attitudes and beliefs we have about a person or group on a conscious level. These biases are often the result of direct exposure to certain stereotypes or cultural norms.

title: Characteristics of Explicit Bias
text: Explicit biases are deliberate and can be self-reported. They are the biases that individuals are aware of and can control.
